name: Go Corona Go (NuTBreAker)
description:
As our Prime Minister declares 21 days of Lock Down, you have to save yourself from the deadly corona virus and police as you're a homeless person and you have nowhere to go.

Features:-

1.  Gear Up yourself with Strong sanitizer.

2. Collect toilet papers which literally has no use.

3. Jump off the ledges.

4. Stomp the Police Cars.
